data.name: Zombie Army 4: WW1 Josiah Outfit
data.detailed_description:
Play as Josiah, dressed in his WW1 outfit!

Josiah’s past is something of a mystery – but as a young man he served in the First World War, and still has the uniform to prove it. These garbs are what remains of his service – a time he’d rather put behind him.
This bundle contains one character outfit and two headgear variants.
data.about_the_game:
Play as Josiah, dressed in his WW1 outfit!

Josiah’s past is something of a mystery – but as a young man he served in the First World War, and still has the uniform to prove it. These garbs are what remains of his service – a time he’d rather put behind him.
This bundle contains one character outfit and two headgear variants.
data.short_description: Play as Josiah, dressed in his WW1 outfit!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
